speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0053/2007 ) by Katalin Lévai, on behalf of the Committee on Legal Affairs, on the Commission recommendation of 18 October 2005 on collective cross-border management of copyright and related rights for legitimate online music services (2005/737/EC) ( 2006/2008(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0053/2007 ) by Katalin Lévai, on behalf of the Committee on Legal Affairs, on the Commission recommendation of 18 October 2005 on collective cross-border management of copyright and related rights for legitimate online music services (2005/737/EC) ( 2006/2008(INI) ).
